headline: Examining Ulta After 48% Stock Surge and Latest Earnings Surprise in 2025
summary: If you are considering what to do with Ulta Beauty stock, you are hardly alone. With so many names in retail, it is not every day you see one carve out a performance like Ulta’s over the past year. The stock recently closed at $549.28, representing an impressive 48.2% gain over the past twelve months. Even year to date, Ulta’s up 28.0%, easily outpacing many broader benchmarks. Most recently, Ulta saw some consolidation, dipping 1.3% in just the last week, but that comes right after a robust...
